title: Morgantown Campus Quarantine Cases by Day
description: Persons are likely in quarantine because they’ve been considered a close contact of someone who tested positive for COVID-19.Important: Quarantine data is currently unavailable due to changes in the University’s contact tracing protocols. In most instances, the primary responsibility for contact tracing has been transferred to the individual who has a positive test result, and they are asked to notify close contacts of possible exposure.
